trans-unit.source: The ManagementCommit attribute marks a method that is called when it is necessary to update a set of read-write properties in one, atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: ManagementCommit 属性标记当有必要在一次原子操作中更新一组读写属性时调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries.
trans-unit.target: 注意：WMI .NET 库现在视为处于最终状态，且没有可用于会影响这些库的非安全性相关问题的进一步开发、增强或更新。

trans-unit.source: The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.
The read-write properties of a class are marked with the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationAttribute> attribute.

In addition, each read-write property can be one of two types: <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationType.Apply> or <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationType.OnCommit>.
trans-unit.target: 此外，每个读 / 写属性可以是两种类型之一：<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationType.Apply>或<xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementConfigurationType.OnCommit>。

trans-unit.source: If a class has read-write properties that are configured as OnCommit, the class should have a method that is marked with the ManagementCommit attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果类具有配置为 OnCommit 的读写属性，此类应该具有用 ManagementCommit 特性标记的方法。

trans-unit.source: The associated method will be called when all OnCommit properties have been set.
trans-unit.target: 已设置了所有 OnCommit 属性时，将调用关联的方法。

trans-unit.source: The marked method is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 标记的方法不是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: If no method is marked with the ManagementCommit attribute, the class manages the configuration updates by itself without any indication that the update has completed.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有方法将标有 ManagementCommit 属性，该类管理本身具有而无需任何更新已完成的指示配置更新。

trans-unit.source: The method marked with the ManagementCommit attribute does not take any parameters and it has a void return type.
trans-unit.target: 用 ManagementCommit 特性标记的方法不采用任何参数，它具有 void 返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementCommitAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementCommitAttribute" /> 类的新实例。
